mapper.select: select student_id as id, name, gender, birth, region, score, entrance_date as entranceDate from student where student_id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into student (student_id, name, gender, birth, region, score, entrance_date) values( #{id}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{birth}, #{region}, #{score}, #{entranceDate});
mapper.update: update student set score = #{id}, name = #{name}, gender = #{gender}, birth = #{birth}, region = #{region}, score = #{score}, entrance_date = #{entranceDate} where student_id=#{id}
mapper.select: select s.student_id as id, s.name, s.gender, s.birth, s.region, s.score, s.entrance_date as entranceDate, c.class_id as "aclass.id", c.name as "aClass.name", c.number as "aClass.number", c.grade as "aClass.grade", c.department_id as "aClass.departmentId" from student as s, class as c where s.class_id=c.class_id
